author: Laurie McGinley, Josh Dawsey, Yasmeen Abutaleb
title: Former FDA chief grabs spotlight with coronavirus plans to ‘turn the lights back on’ - The Washington Post
description: A year after Scott Gottlieb resigned unexpectedly as Food and Drug Administration commissioner to return home to his family in Westport, Conn., he has never been in such demand — advising lawmakers, governors, members of the Trump administration and even the …
content:
The reason is simple, say the officials seeking his advice: Hes got a plan. In fact, several of them.
At a time when many complain about the lack of a federal strategy, Gottlieb and four co-authors have published two detailed road maps on how to navigate the… [+11247 chars]
